Full stack web developer

I'm a fast learner passionate about web development looking to improve my programing skills every day

Hi, I'm Mihai.Nice to meet you!

I started my journey as a web developer in January 2018. After studying the basis of JavaScript by myself, in March I joined the Ironhack bootcamp in Barcelona where, for 9 intensive weeks, I have studied web development.

Currently I'm involved in a project where our team is in charge with process automation. For this purpose we are using IBM Business Process Management together with vRealize Orchestrator. We are responsible for creating new workflows as well as improving the old ones in order to ensure a complete process of server provisioning.

In parallel we are working to a custom process orchestrator that will substitute the IBPM. In this project I'm responsible for the front-end wich is made with Vuejs 2.

FRONT-END
